name: Experimental EuropaXS flight simulator
description:
Developed on OCULUS DK2 executable signed by my self signed certificate.

Fly This Europa XSs a virtual reality game for the Oculus Rift and ANDROID's 

Google Play platforms.

Visual Effects Experts who worked on a dozen Hollywood Blockbusters had nothing to do with this app! I created it so I could fly N914XS while overseas ( hangared in McGregor Texas)   ;-)

 Grand Canyon flying adventure, fly the Martian Valley or try your luck strafing the train or to start "at altitude", and be airborne in an instant. 

Click FLY, slide the throttle up to get going, steer with and apply rudder (right rudder) correcting for left turning tendency.

Europa XS sports an NACA23012 "12%" airfoil, Rigid body mass of 800, force at max RPM 3000

UNKNOWN PUBLISHER will scare you away; but, it's signed!!!
